name: places/ChIJd6XeyYRYwokRosw64G7HsOg
formattedAddress: 549 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 549 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: The massage I received at this neighborhood bodywork studio  loosened my tight muscles and sore back. The masseuse was exceptionally strong and instinctively found his way to my problem areas. While the set up is simple, the facilities were comfortable and he used hot stones and nice oil. I walked in tight and stiff and left relaxed and more flexible. I highly recommend Akai Wellness Center for therapeutic massages.

originalText.text: Found by chance, read many 5 star reviews. Tried 1 hr. Deep tissue massage by Allan. Excellent work and excellent price. As the other reviews said, this is not a high end, chi-chi place… come here for a straight up great massage to heal your body. Small private room, basic- but massage was A+. Hot towels, stones, very experienced body work. They offer other services that I will try. If you’re not picky about how the place looks, but want a big bang for your buck, go.

originalText.text: This place cannot be beat for skill level of the massage therapists, combined with cost effectiveness. They have excellent hours and are easy to book in with. A 1-hour back, neck & body massage can ease all sorts of ailments due to stress, over-exertion, anxiety, stiffness and old injuries. The owner also is an excellent Acupuncturist, which has a whole list of additional health benefits. Definitely worth trying it and returning often. I try to go once or twice per month and it helps me immeasurably.

originalText.text: Amazing massage! Super affordable and you can tell they knew what they are doing. Handled everything with care and relieved my back pain. Surprisingly the calf massage was the best part I will definitely be coming back!

text.text: Amazing massage! Super affordable and you can tell they knew what they are doing. Handled everything with care and relieved my back pain. Surprisingly the calf massage was the best part I will definitely be coming back!

originalText.text: As a runner, My legs get tired. I have been coming here once a week for the past 3 years. All of the staff is very skilled. Amy is amazing, despite being older, she is probably the strongest masseuse out there, and very experienced. Lilly is very skilled as well and very strong. Allan (The owner), is super strong, skilled and good at acupuncture. Support local businesses. The prices are very fair, and please tip the masseuse as the tips make a difference in their lives!
